verses.verse: A Psalm of the sons of Korah; a Song. His <S%H3248>foundation<s%> is in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2042>mountains<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> More than all the <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
Glorious <S%H3513>things<s%> are <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of <S%H5892>thee<s%>, O city of <S%H430>God<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

I will make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of <S%H7294>Rahab<s%> and <S%H894>Babylon<s%> as among them that <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H6429>me<s%>: Behold, Philistia, and <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>, with <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>: This one was born <S%H3205>there<s%>.
Yea <S%H6726><s%>, of Zion it shall be <S%H559>said<s%>, This one and that <S%H376>one<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> in <S%H5945>her<s%>; And the Most High himself will establish <S%H3559>her<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H5608>count<s%>, when he writeth <S%H3789>up<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, This one was <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H5542>there<s%>. [[Selah
They that <S%H7891>sing<s%> as well as they that <S%H2490>dance<s%> shall <S%H4599>say<s%>, All my fountains are in thee.
